data.name: AddictionTreatmentHistory_HighestCareLevelFailedFromInPast90Days
data.value: In the past 90 days, have you relapsed after being discharged from, or dropping out of, another treatment program? What type? (If the patient has relapsed, what was the highest level of care that the patient failed in past 90 days?)

data.name: AddictionTreatmentHistory_MostRecentCareLevelCompleted
data.value: Have you just successfully completed (or are you just about to complete) a treatment program? What type? (If yes, what was the Level of Care?)

data.name: AddictionTreatmentHistory_NumberOfDaysOutpatientTreatmentInPast30Days
data.value: How many days have you been treated in an outpatient setting for alcohol or drugs in the past 30 days (include attending N.A., A.A., etc.)?

data.name: AddictionTreatmentHistory_NumberOfTimesAlcoholTreatmentDetoxificationOnlyLifetime
data.value: Counting the times in your life you have been treated for alcohol use problems, how many of these were withdrawal management only?

data.name: AddictionTreatmentHistory_NumberOfTimesDrugTreatmentDetoxificationOnlyLifetime
data.value: Counting the times in your life you have been treated for drug use problems, how many of these were withdrawal management only?

data.name: AddictionTreatmentHistory_NumberOfTimesDrugTreatmentLifetime
data.value: How many times in your life have you been treated for drug use problems?

data.name: AddictionTreatmentHistory_NumberOfTimesTreatedForAlcoholAbuseLifetime
data.value: How many times in your life have you been treated for alcohol use problems?

data.name: AddictionTreatmentHistory_PreviousSubstanceUseTreatment
data.value: Have you had any previous treatment for alcohol or other drug use problems?

data.name: AddictionTreatmentHistory_UsuallyEnteredContinuedTreatmentAfterDetoxification
data.value: After withdrawal management, have you usually entered continued treatment?

data.name: AddictionTreatmentHistory_UsuallyLeftDetoxificationBeforeAdvised
data.value: Have you usually left withdrawal management before you were advised to, in the past?

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_AddictionSymptomsIncreasedRecently
data.value: Have your addiction symptoms increased recently? How...? (Ask about any items below not mentioned by the patient) Have you had more craving, risk behaviors, more frequent use, increased amount of substance or have you used a more rapid route of administration?

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_ConcernsAboutPursuingTreatment
data.value: Do you have any concerns about pursuing treatment...? Would anything possibly hold you back, such as money, insurance, schedule, attending groups, having to take medicines, drug tests, or drinking or drug-using friends?

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_CurrentStrengthOfSubstanceUseDesire
data.value: How strong is your desire to use any drug right now?

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_FeelLikelyToContinueSubstanceUseOrRelapse
data.value: Do you feel you are likely to continue using or, if not using, that you are in danger of relapsing? How soon...? Do you feel at risk, even if you have had some treatment previously?

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_HelpfulnessOfTreatment
data.value: How do you think treatment will help? or, if rejects help, Why do you think treatment will not help? If entering or continuing treatment: Do you expect to be in treatment in 3 months?

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_LikelihoodPreviousEnvironmentWillInduceSubstanceUse
data.value: Imagine yourself in the environment in which you previously used drugs and/or alcohol. If you were living in this environment today, what is the likelihood that you would use?

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_NumberOfMonthsSinceAbstinenceEndFromSubstance
data.value: How many months ago did this abstinence end? (Select 0 if still abstinent)

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_NumberOfMonthsSinceLastVoluntaryAbstinenceFromSubstance
data.value: How long was your last period of voluntary abstinence from this major substance? (Select 0, if never abstinent)

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_NumberOfTimesOverdosedOnDrugs
data.value: How many times have you overdosed on drugs or alcohol?

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_PossibleFutureRelapseCause
data.value: What might cause you to relapse in the future?

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_StrategyToPreventRelapse
data.value: How do you plan to prevent relapses? After answer, if not mentioned, ask: How about counseling, meetings, a sponsor, or new activities or sober friends? How active have you been with any of these recently?

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_StrengthOfSubstanceUseUrgeDueToEnvironmentalTriggers
data.value: Rate how strong your urges are for a drug and/or alcohol when something in the environment reminds you of it.

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_SubstanceOverdoseInPast24Hours
data.value: Have you had a substance (alcohol and/or drug) overdose in the past 24 hours?

data.name: AdditionalAddictionAndTreatmentItems_WhichSubstanceIsMajorProblem
data.value: Which substance is the major problem?

data.name: CompletionSection_AcceptableLevelsOfCare
data.value: What are acceptable Levels of Care for which the patient's mental status is sufficiently stable and adequate to participate in therapeutic interventions and to benefit from treatment? (Check all that apply)

data.name: CompletionSection_DetoxificationRequiredMoreThanHourlyMonitoring
data.value: Does the patient's condition (intoxication, withdrawal, medical, psychiatric) or withdrawal management procedure (e.g., rapid opioid withdrawal management) require monitoring or intervention more frequently than hourly?

data.name: CompletionSection_IsAbleToSelfAdministerMedication
data.value: If any medications are being or will be prescribed, is the patient willing and able to self-administer these with good compliance?

data.name: CompletionSection_IsCurrentlyResidingInCareLevel_III_1
data.value: Is the patient currently residing in Level 3.1 care?

data.name: CompletionSection_MedicalConditionEndangeredByContinuedSubstanceUse
data.value: Would the patient's continued substance use endanger his/her medical condition?

data.name: CompletionSection_MedicalConditionExacerbatedByContinuedSubstanceUse
data.value: Is the patient's use of substances likely to cause a severely dangerous exacerbation of a medical condition?

data.name: CompletionSection_MedicalConditionMakesAbstinenceVital
data.value: Does the patient's medical condition make abstinence vital?

data.name: CompletionSection_MedicalConditionStabilizedInPast24HoursPermittingTreatment
data.value: If the patient has a history of an unstable medical condition: Has this condition stabilized in the past 24 hours, permitting the patient to participate and benefit from chemical dependency treatment?

data.name: CompletionSection_MedicalProblemsCausedBySubstanceUse
data.value: Are the patient's biomedical problems the complications of alcohol or drug use?

data.name: CompletionSection_PrnHourlyMonitoringSufficientToDetermineDetoxServiceLevel
data.value: Does the program offer PRN hourly monitoring long enough to determine the need for more or less intensive withdrawal management services?

data.name: CompletionSection_RecommendedCareLevels
data.value: Given what you know about this patient, what best treatment(s) would you recommend at this time (More than one possible)? Assume that there are no funding problems. Assume that all of the following are available:

data.name: CompletionSection_RecommendedCareLevelSubCategory
data.value: Given what you know, indicate the best Sub-category for this Level of Care, at this time?

data.name: CompletionSection_RequiresTreatmentModeOnlyAvailableInCareLevel_III_7
data.value: Does the patient require a treatment mode that is only available in Level 3.7, (e.g. aversion) or a similar behavioral therapy?

data.name: CompletionSection_RespondedPositivelyToEmotionalSupportDuringInterview
